verses.verse: "In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be a spring <S%H4726><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> for sin <S%H2403><s%> and for uncleanness. <S%H5079><s%>

It will come to pass in that day, <S%H3117><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the idols <S%H6091><s%> out of the land, <S%H776><s%> and they will be remembered <S%H2142><s%> no more. <S%H5030><s%> I will also cause the prophets and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of impurity <S%H2932><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> out of the land. <S%H776><s%>

It will happen that, <S%H376><s%> when anyone still prophesies, <S%H5012><s%> then his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> who bore <S%H3205><s%> him will tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H2421><s%> 'You must die, because you speak <S%H559><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%>' and his father <S%H3205><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> who bore <S%H3205><s%> him will stab <S%H1856><s%> him when he prophesies. <S%H5012><s%>

It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that the prophets <S%H5030><s%> will each <S%H376><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of his vision, <S%H2384><s%> when he prophesies; <S%H5012><s%> neither will they wear <S%H3847><s%> a hairy <S%H8181><s%> mantle <S%H155><s%> to deceive: <S%H3584><s%>
but he will say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5030><s%> 'I am no prophet, I am a tiller <S%H5647><s%> of the ground; <S%H120><s%> for I have been made a bondservant <S%H7069><s%> from my youth. <S%H5271><s%>'

One will say <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H4347><s%> 'What are these wounds between your arms? <S%H3027><s%>' Then he will answer, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5221><s%> 'Those with which I was wounded in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my friends. <S%H157><s%>'

"Awake, <S%H5782><s%> sword, <S%H2719><s%> against my shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> and against the man <S%H1397><s%> who is close <S%H5997><s%> to me, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> "Strike <S%H5221><s%> the shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> will be scattered; <S%H6327><s%> and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against the little ones. <S%H6819><s%>

It shall happen that in all the land, <S%H776><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "two <S%H8147><s%> parts <S%H6310><s%> in it will be cut off <S%H3772><s%> and die; <S%H1478><s%> but the third <S%H7992><s%> will be left in it. <S%H3498><s%>

I will bring <S%H935><s%> the third part <S%H7992><s%> into the fire, <S%H784><s%> and will refine <S%H6884><s%> them as silver <S%H3701><s%> is refined, <S%H6884><s%> and will test <S%H974><s%> them like gold <S%H2091><s%> is tested. <S%H974><s%> They will call <S%H7121><s%> on my name, <S%H8034><s%> and I will hear <S%H6030><s%> them. <S%H559><s%> I will say, <S%H5971><s%> 'It is my people;' and they will say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh is my God. <S%H430><s%>'"
